hanzi-su-wiki:
俸

Значения

Жалование, оклад

Мнемоника

Преподносить 奉 рабочему человеку 亻 жалование за его труды.
purpleculture_pinyin:
fèng
salary
зарплата
rtega_mnemonic:
俸俸RSwages, salary, official emolument
  • respecting 奉 a man's 亻 work by paying him his salary
purpleculture_info: Ideographic: Wages offered 奉 to a person 亻; 奉 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
薪俸 [ xīn fèng ]: salary; pay
月俸 [ yuè fèng ]: monthly salary
年俸 [ nián fèng ]: yearly salary
常俸 [ cháng fèng ]: fixed salary of an official
俸禄 [ fèng lù ]: official's salary (in feudal times)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 亻 [ rén ] man, person; people
    • 奉 [ fèng ] to offer, to respect, to server; to receive
heisig_constituent: stipend, person, observance, dedicate, bonsai, cornstalk
koohiiStory1: The stipend is given to the student-PERSON who has come to Japan DEDICATED to study.
koohiiStory2: People who are highly dedicated to their jobs get good salaries/stipends.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The leader says spring is looking dry, so you'll need your salary in advance.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: The leader shows you the number, it's all of your salary for spring. "This way, if things dry up worse, you'll be okay for a while," he says. This is awfully nice, but very suspicious at the same time.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Your salary is sent straight to your home (ほう) instead of the bank. Okay, something is definitely fishy here.
WaniKani_Reading_Info:
You're sitting at home, and there is a knock at the door. A man in a suit, hat, and dark sunglasses hands you a briefcase full of money. "Here's your spring salary. Enjoy the dry weather."
"T-thanks?"
Welp, have fun at home with your stacks of early salary cash.
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 奉 (たてまつる、ホウ преподносить). Не путать: 棒 (ボウ палка, шест), 捧 (ささげる、ホウ поднимать, преподносить).
Ru_Words:
俸ほう
  • жалованье
    • 俸給ほうきゅう
  • жалованье, денежное содержание
    • 加俸かほう
  • наградные, премиальные
    • 年俸ねんぽう
  • годовой оклад
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), ｜, 二 (два), 人 (человек), 化 (превращаться), 大 (большой)
Ru_trainchinese: fèng: (графема) жалованье чиновника (в феодальные времена)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the man (亻) is presented (奉) with his salary

俸字的基本解释

俸
fèng
官员等所得的薪金：俸禄。薪俸。俸给（j?）。俸金。

俸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fèng］
［《廣韻》扶用切，去用，奉。］
(1)俸禄。旧指官吏所得的薪给。
(2)指职员的薪水。
(3)旧指官吏任职的年资。
(4)姓。《姓氏寻源》：“奉姓，後加人。”今广西壮族自治区有此姓。

俸字的英文翻译

◎ 俸
pay, salary

俸字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　俸； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页106第19
【廣韻】扶用切【集韻】【韻會】房用切，?音㡝。秩祿也。【前漢·宣帝詔】今小吏勤事而俸薄，欲其無侵漁百姓，難矣。增其俸百石以上什五。【後漢·光武紀】詔增百官俸。【宋太祖詔】吏員猥多，難以求治。俸祿鮮薄，未可責廉。與其宂員而重費，莫若省官而益俸。差減其員，舊俸月增給五十。【長篇】賜韓世忠妻俸。　亦作奉。【前漢·公孫弘傳】奉祿甚多。

俸字的源字形

俸字的起名意思

：指俸禄、薪俸。

Salaries
Basic explanation of words
Salaries
fèng
Salaries for officials, etc.: Salaries. Salaries. Pay (j?). Salary.
Salaries
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fèng］
["Guangyun" help to cut, use, and bless. ]
(1) Salaries. Old refers to the salary received by officials.
(2) Refers to the salary of the staff.
(3) Old refers to the seniority of officials.
(4) Last name. "Looking for the Origin of Surnames": "Feng surname, add people later." Today, Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region has this surname.

pay, salary
Salaries
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　俸; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 106 Page 19
[Guang Yun] Helping to use cuts [Ji Yun] [Rhymes] Room to use cuttings,? Sound 㡝. Zhilu also. [Previous Han·Xuandi Emperor] Today's small officials are diligent and poor. It is difficult for them to not invade the fishermen. Increase your salary by more than a hundred stones. 【Later Han·Guangwu Ji】Increase one hundred official salaries. 【Emperor of Song Taizu】There are too many officials and it is difficult to seek treatment. Salaries are thin and unacceptable. Instead of paying a lot of money for the officials, it is better for the provincial officials to benefit. After subtracting its staff, the old salary is increased to fifty a month. [Long story] To Han Shizhong's wife.　 also served as a bong. [Previous Han·Gongsun Hongzhuan] There were a lot of honors.

: Refers to salary, salary.
俸
会意字。从1(人),表示人双手捧物;从奉,奉是捧的本字;奉(feng )兼表声。本义是双手捧物。引申为供给,又引申
为俸禄。俸禄义本用奉,后来加“”成俸。
日时称官吏的薪水:~禄「薪~。

Заработная плата
Зная слово.
От 1 (человек) это означает, что люди держат вещи обеими руками; от Фэн, Фэн - оригинальное слово для удержания; Фэн (фэн) также представляет звук.
Первоначальный смысл - держать вещи обеими руками.
Продление - это предложение, а продление - зарплата.
Заработная плата изначально использовалась как дань, а позже была добавлена ​​как оклад "".
Заработная плата чиновников называется «Зарплата» в настоящее время: ~ Лу «Зарплата ~».
~ Лу Бо ~ Официальный ~ Толстый ~ Плюс ~ Минус ~ Год ~ Зарплата ~

Your salary is sent straight to your home (ほう) instead of the bank. Okay, something is definitely fishy here.
You're sitting at home, and there is a knock at the door. A man in a suit, hat, and dark sunglasses hands you a briefcase full of money. "Here's your spring salary. Enjoy the dry weather."
"T-thanks?"
Welp, have fun at home with your stacks of early salary cash.
